objective: Add full validate_asset support so synesthetic-mcp matches docs/mcp_spec.md v0.2.3 and responds correctly to Labs Critic calls.

gaps.description: MCP responds with {"ok":false, "reason":"unsupported"} because validate_asset is not implemented.
changes: In mcp/validate.py, implement validate_asset(asset, schema) using jsonschema Draft 2020-12
In mcp/stdio_main.py, register validate_asset as a JSON-RPC method
Add regression tests in tests/test_validate.py to cover: valid asset, invalid asset (wrong type), missing schema param
Update docs/mcp_spec.md if needed to confirm response shape is exactly spec-compliant

rules: Align code, tests, and docs with spec v0.2.3

exit_criteria: validate_asset implemented in mcp/validate.py and exposed via STDIO
Invalid assets return {"ok":false, "reason":"validation_failed"} with sorted RFC6901 errors
Tests in tests/test_validate.py cover all three paths
